name: Fake Heart
storyline:
Dana, a girl who presented a new day to Jade who was suffering day by day.
However, Dana surrenders and passes away due to the Sun's hatred that she brought Spring along with her.

Jade who's living a colorless life encounters a second spring like a miracle.
Will this little girl be able to bring happiness into Jade's life again?

You will become a character named 'Jade' and encounter the stories that are hidden in the the beautiful World of Black & White. Get ready to discover various stories and characters and the grief hidden beneath them with Jade the old storymaker and a little girl.

You never know if you may reveal the false secret on the way.
summary: Fake Heart is an "Interactive-Visual Novel" game about an episode between elderly fairy tale writer Jade and granddaughter Sarah.
